subject: Basketball (College)
Officiating (Sports)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: The tournament has a familiar refrain created by a specific model of whistle, the Fox 40, and this year it is being used to automatically stop the game clock.
snippet: The tournament has a familiar refrain created by a specific model of whistle, the Fox 40, and this year it is being used to automatically stop the game clock.
